name: Hallow's Eve Escape
description:
Hallow's Eve Escape was a midterm project done for my Comparative Engines class for my MFA Game Design degree at LCAD. This project was more of a Unity learning exercise. There is no end screen or pause/exit screen.

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse


WalkW, A, S, D
Direction/LookMove mouse
JumpSpace

Assets:

Fantasy Graveyard

Ghost Cute Series

Cartoon Graveyard Props
